name: 國際行銷管理
goals: Students will be able to comprehend multinational cooperation’s diverse management approaches, global marketing strategies and the limitations for different approaches and strategies.

Students will be able to develop effective marketing strategies in the global market. In the meantime, they will be able to conduct effective presentation and communication to the key business stakeholders.
Through the course activities, students will be able to analyze different markets and develop their problem solving and communicating skills.
syllabus:
**【授課方式：16+2週】**

Week 1: Syllabus Review and Introduction to Global Marketing Management

Week 2: Global Marketing Environments: Economic,Financial, and Political Issues

Week 3: Global Cultural Environment and Buying Behavior

Week 4: Global Segmentation and Positioning I

Week 5: Global Segmentation and Positioning II

Week 6: Global Marketing Strategies

Week 7: Market Research

Week 8: Global Market Entry Strategies & Product & Market Development

Week 9: Mid-term Exam week (self-study, no class)

Week 10: Midterm exam in the class

Week 11: Global Logistics and Distribution

Week 12: Communicating With the World Consumer

Week 13: Guest speech

Week 14: Marketing in Emerging Market

Week 15: Oral Presentation I

Week 16: Oral Presentation II

Week 17: self study (no class)

Week 18: self study (no class)
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
